title: Who Translated the Turkish Alcoran (1649)? In Defence of an Alternative View
abstract: In the 2014 issue of this Journal, Noel Malcolm challenged my interpretation of The Alcoran of Mahomet, … newly Englished (1649). My intention here is to respond to his criticism and state more forcefully my reasons for considering an alternative to his interpretation of the evidence.
